original_title: Tranceformer: A Portrait of Lars von Trier
overview: A portrait of Denmark's most acclaimed and controversial director, Lars von Trier. A meeting with von Trier on a private level as well as with his film universe. Filmmaker Stig Bj√∂rkman follow von Trier during a period of more than two years, meet him at work, at home and at leisure. Written by Fredrik Klasson
title: Tranceformer: A Portrait of Lars von Trier
